verbose_text: At steady state, ILC1 and NK cells can be identified by differential expression of TRAIL, CD49a, and CXCR6 and the transcription factors Eomes and promyelocytic leukemia zinc finger protein (PLZF), however during inflammation these surface markers and transcription factors can become altered which impedes the ability to track bona fide ILC1s.
evidence: expression of TRAIL, CD49a, and CXCR6
